Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: So https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-4918 did not fix this issue? ~harrisob@us.ibm.com ?

Action.author: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Action.body: I could really use the debug log, it will show which blocks are being fetched during the getChannelConfig(). This sure looks like https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-4918,

Action.author: sandp125
Action.body: ~rameshthoomu pushed the latest node modules. I am getting the latest config block from getChannelConfig(). I am marking this issue as fixed.
